title: #323: Mitzi
itunes:title: Mitzi
description: Mitzi Shore came into my life in my first 3 months of standup. I spent the next 10 years getting close with the owner of the Comedy Store. She passed away earlier this month. And I took the opportunity to share, but really to relive all the things I learned from her and all the times we had, good and terrible. She was a massive part of my development as a comedian. The most important part, really. So it's really unsettling having her gone for good. Join me as I come to terms with what Mitzi meant to me.

The most important part, really. So it's really unsettling having her gone for good. Join me as I come to terms with what Mitzi meant to me.
